# itemIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the scrubber item that is represented by the item’s layout attributes.

## Declaration

```swift
var itemIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Controlling the layout

- **alpha**: The item’s alpha value.
- **frame**: The frame of the scrubber item.

items.description: The frame of the scrubber item.
items.name: frame
